title: Thunderbird receives incoming mail, won't send outgoing mail
content:
Running Thunderbird 115 on a Mac laptop running Sonoma 14.4.1 Server name: mail.rainierconnect.com Port 587 Connection Security: STARTTLS Authentification: Normal password

Beginning at 3:30 pm (PST) this afternoon the laptop would show this error message after user pressed send:

"Must issue a STARTTLS command first"

Laptop receives mail fine. User can send and receive mail on her iPhone.

ISP verified that the Server Names and settings for incoming and outgoing mail are correct.
creator: henrysuso

title: Mozilla Thunderbird
content: My Thunderbird email is not responding and also give me a message which says my email peter566@exemail.com.au is not correct when I know it is so how can I get into my settings to try and fix the problem.

title: Thunderbird E-Mail Account
content: Tried to establish Thunderbird on new Laptop Bell Latitude and all e-mail accounts but one could be installed again. Only mak@koepcke-homberg.de settled at www.ionos.de does not fit despite fully accurate details, quite the same as on PC at home (Thunderbird!), Android Mobile (K9), Tablet Galaxy (Samsung E-email). Please see attached Screenshot! Happy to receive your advise...:-) Arnd

title: Thunderbird does not retrieve pop messages from yahoo
content:
Thunderbird 115/Ubuntu 22.04 stopped downloading messages from yahoo with no visible change about 2 months ago. Pop port can be accessed from console using telnet command. Retrieving pop messages from Gmail is OK. Here is quotation from error console


Uncaught TypeError: aMsg.conversation.account.statusInfo is null 

   userIconPath resource:///modules/imThemes.sys.mjs:485    replaceKeywordsInHTML resource:///modules/imThemes.sys.mjs:531    getHTMLForMessage resource:///modules/imThemes.sys.mjs:633    displayMessage chrome://chat/content/conversation-browser.js:649    displayPendingMessages chrome://chat/content/conversation-browser.js:543

2 imThemes.sys.mjs:485:7 Attempt to set a forbidden header was denied: Content-Length 2 cardbookWebDAV.js:386:17 TypeError: Headers.set: cf_use_ob=443; path=/; expires=tue, 09-apr-24 05:27:20 gmt is an invalid header name. Utils.sys.mjs:245:21 

   onload resource://services-settings/Utils.sys.mjs:245    forEach self-hosted:203    onload resource://services-settings/Utils.sys.mjs:241

Missing resource in locale ru: devtools/client/toolbox.ftl NotFoundError: No such JSWindowActor 'DevToolsFrame' 10 ‘src’ attribute of <script> element is not a valid URI: “//i.alicdn.com/ams-static/3.0.0/global/base.js” blank:1:1 ‘src’ attribute of <script> element is not a valid URI: “//i.alicdn.com/ae-ams-ui/1.1.0/widget/index.js” blank:1:1 tb.account.size_on_disk - Truncating float/double number. 2 mailnews.pop3.0: NetworkTimeoutError: a Network error occurred Pop3Client.jsm:369:18

mailnews.pop3.0: SecurityError info: Pop3Client.jsm:375:20

title: my email will not accept me, and ask me to be sure to have the rights to write in the file system.
content:
What should I do, that would secure the emails from many years back. I can see my email account and the emails, which were there when the problem started, but I can't open them without destroying them.

I can read new emails on my cell phone, but i need a lot of the emails, which are there, but I cant open them. I really hope, that you can help me. regards Ester Gregersen Denmark.
creator: ester.g

title: Email deleted from gmail inbox
content:
Hello Mozilal community, I installed and configured thunderbird for first time and didn't realize that when I was done , my all emails were deleted from gmail inbox.


Is there any way to get back all email back in Gmail inbox from thunderbird?

Thanks in advance Abdul Haanan
creator: hanangul12
